dcterms:creator: Amir Shahroudy
Jun Liu
Tian-Tsong Ng

dcterms:description: A large scale dataset for 3D human activity analysis, containing 56,000 samples from 40 individuals and 60 action classes, classified into daily activities, health-related actions, and interactions.
dcterms:title: NTU-60

dcterms:creator: Jun Liu
Amir Shahroudy
Mauricio Perez
Gang Wang
Ling-Yu Duan
Alex C Kot
dcterms:description: A large-scale benchmark for 3D human activity understanding, extending the NTU-60 dataset with 106 subjects performing 120 action classes and 114,500 video samples.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 120
